alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Walworth (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued November 05 at 11:34AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT FOR WALWORTH AND SOUTHEASTERN JEFFERSON COUNTIES... At 1134 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Jefferson to near Whitewater to near Delavan, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Whitewater, Fort Atkinson, Elkhorn, Delavan, Lake Geneva, East Troy, Williams Bay, Genoa City, Walworth, Palmyra, Fontana-On-Geneva Lake, Sharon, Darien, Como, Pell Lake, Potter Lake, Powers Lake, Richmond, Springfield and La Grange. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
